parse.title: The Lord of the Rings Calendar 2002

wikitext.*:
[[Image:The Lord of the Rings Calendar 2002.jpg|thumb]]

'''The Lord of the Rings Calendar 2002''' is an Italian calendar produced by Idea Libri and contains illustrations by [[Anton Spazzapan]].

* ISBN 88-7082-733-X
* Dimensions: 15 3/4 x 15 3/4 inches
* Wire bound
* Heavy wire hanging loop

Another Italian calendar exists with a different ISBN.
* ISBN 88-7082-740-2 

{{title|italics}}
